title: test/e2e: fail test rather than flooding logs if PVC watch is closed prematurely

labels.name: cncf-cla: yes
labels.description: Indicates the PR's author has signed the CNCF CLA.

labels.name: kind/failing-test
labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a consistently or frequently failing test.

labels.name: priority/important-soon
labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.

labels.name: release-note-none
labels.description: Denotes a PR that doesn't merit a release note.

labels.name: sig/storage
labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Storage.

labels.name: sig/testing
labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Testing.

labels.name: size/XS
labels.description: Denotes a PR that changes 0-9 lines, ignoring generated files.

body:
If the watch is closed prematurely the for/select loop will
spew "PVC event : <nil>" as fast as possible until the test times
out, flooding logs.

```
STEP: Checking PVC events
```
